Widget.name: Radio Buttons
Widget.Description: This widget allows you to add a control with radio buttons on a form.

Option.name: Name
Option.Description: Defines the name of this control.

Option.name: Value
Option.Description: Defines the type of value used by this control.

OptionComposite.name: Items
OptionComposite.Description: Specifies the items displayed in the control.

Option.name: Enable Validation
Option.Description: Specifies whether to enable validation for this control.

Option.name: Validation message
Option.Description: Specifies the message that will be displayed when validation fails for this field.
